name: Deadly Touch
text: Give to the Anna Marie player • If Touched is attached to a friendly character, deal 2 damage to that character. Discard this card. • If Touched is not attached to a friendly character, place 2 threat on the main scheme. Discard this card.

name: Mystique
text: Toughness. Villainous. Forced Response: After Mystique engages you, search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for a copy of the Misled treachery and shuffle it into your deck.

flavor: While she knows Mystique can't be trusted, Rogue still finds it hard to reject the woman who raised her.
name: Mystique's Manipulations
text: When Defeated: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of the Misled treachery and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Misled
text: When Revealed: Shuffle this card into your deck. This card gains surge. Forced Response: After this card enters your hand, place 2 threat on the main scheme. (You may discard this card from your hand at the end of the player phase like any other card.)

name: Donald Pierce
text: Teamwork ([[REAVER]]). Villainous. Forced Response: After Donald Pierce engages you, reveal the topmost [[REAVER]] minion from the discard pile.

name: Skullbuster
text: Teamwork ([[REAVER]]). Toughness. Forced Response: After Skullbuster engages you, place 1 threat on the main scheme for each [[REAVER]] minion engaged with you.

name: Bonebreaker
text: Teamwork ([[REAVER]]). Toughness. Forced Response: After Bonebreaker engages you, take 1 indirect damage for each [[REAVER]] minion engaged with you.

name: Wade Cole
text: Teamwork ([[REAVER]]). When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of the Cybernetic Enhancements attachment and attach it to Wade Cole. (Shuffle.)

name: Murray Reese
text: Teamwork ([[REAVER]]). When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of the Cybernetic Enhancements attachment and attach it to Murray Reese. (Shuffle.)

name: The Reavers
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards cards from the encounter deck until a [[REAVER]] minion is discarded, then reveals that minion.

name: Cybernetic Enhancements
text: Attach to a minion. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion cannot take damage. [star] Forced Response: After attached minion attacks, discard Cybernetic Enhancements.
